basic_info.name: Raghu Engineering College Visakhapatnam Placements
description: The Training and Placement cell of Raghu Engineering College placements gives personal and career-oriented support to the students. The Placement cell was established in the year 2005 that helped a large number of deserving students to get the opportunity to be placed. The companies that visit here include Infosys, Virtusa, Tech Mahindra, Mindtree, IBM, Polaris, Wipro, Accenture, Capgemini, Juspay, and many more. This year Amazon had 05 selections, TCS with 66 selections, Infosys with 103 selections, HCL 45 selections, Cognizant 87 selections with various others. The college makes all the efforts for meritorious students employable and welcomes industry-institute interaction.

basic_info.name: Raghu Engineering College Visakhapatnam Faculty
description: The faculty here is very well experienced with 36 Ph.D. HOLDERS. The principal of this college is Dr. R. Kameswara Rao. Sri Raghu Kalidindi is the chairman here. They are highly knowledgeable and have great expertise in teaching. They are supportive and friendly with students while clearing their doubts and make them ready for the industries.

faqs.question: Ques. Is it good to join Raghu Engineering College in Visakhapatnam?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, it will be good to join Raghu engineering college in Visakhapatnam because this college is a very good location and the faculty in this college is highly experienced, also the overall placements of this college here are great.

faqs.question: Ques. What is the quality policy here?
faqs.answer: Ans.Raghu Engineering College believes in ethical values along with innovative teaching through an interactive, activity-based pedagogy; provide the ideal of infrastructural facilities; inculcates engineering temper among the students through the use of the current Information and Communication Technologies; strives for a valuable, responsive and transparent administration in all areas.

faqs.question: Ques. How is the quality of education here?
faqs.answer: Ans.The quality of education at Raghu engineering institution gives the alumni an unreachable position as well as never expected kind of valued kind they are in. This college has great infrastructure and good lab & library facilities.

faqs.question: Ques. How is Campus Life at the college?
faqs.answer: Ans.Campus life is very interesting with developed day to day variations. You can experience a nice atmosphere all around the campus with a fine valued institution in Andhra Pradesh. The Annual sports meet is organized every year at the college. Students here learn overall development. The campus is very safe and has a good connectivity.

faqs.question: Ques. What about the entrance exam?
faqs.answer: Ans.The entrance exam you need to write is EAMCET. The students who have intermediate qualification and good grade points in their tenth and plus two standards are eligible to get admission in the Raghu engineering institute. There are no interviews for the admission process.

Section.name: About REC
Section.description:
Raghu Engineering College - [REC], located in Visakhapatnam is a private institute established in the year 2001. REC received autonomous status by UGC and is affiliated with the Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University. REC is approved by AICTE and accredited by NAAC by ‘A’ grade and NBA. The college is known for its UG and PG courses in engineering stream. The campus is situated about 35 km away from Visakhapatnam and 15 km. away from Vizianagaram border on national highway 43.
Admissions to B.Tech courses are based on the candidate's performance in the entrance exam EAMCET.
Admissions to M.Tech courses also depend upon GATE scores.
Below mentioned are the courses along with their details provided by the college.

The Training and Placement cell of Raghu Engineering College placements gives personal and career-oriented support to the students. The Placement cell was established in the year 2005 that helped a large number of deserving students to get the opportunity to be placed. The companies that visit here include Infosys, Virtusa, Tech Mahindra, Mindtree, IBM, Polaris, Wipro, Accenture, Capgemini, Juspay, and many more. This year Amazon had 05 selections, TCS with 66 selections, Infosys with 103 selections, HCL 45 selections, Cognizant 87 selections with various others. Ques. Is it good to join Raghu Engineering College in Visakhapatnam?
Ans. Yes, it will be good to join Raghu engineering college in Visakhapatnam because this college is a very good location and the faculty in this college is highly experienced, also the overall placements of this college here are great.
Ques. What is the quality policy here?
Ans. Raghu Engineering College believes in ethical values along with innovative teaching through an interactive, activity-based pedagogy; provide the ideal of infrastructural facilities; inculcates engineering temper among the students through the use of the current Information and Communication Technologies; strives for a valuable, responsive and transparent administration in all areas.
Ques. How is the quality of education here?
Ans. The quality of education at Raghu engineering institution gives the alumni an unreachable position as well as never expected kind of valued kind they are in. This college has great infrastructure and good lab & library facilities.
Ques. How is Campus Life at the college?
Ans. Campus life is very interesting with developed day to day variations. You can experience a nice atmosphere all around the campus with a fine valued institution in Andhra Pradesh. The Annual sports meet is organized every year at the college. Students here learn overall development. The campus is very safe and has a good connectivity.
Ques. What about the entrance exam?
Ans. The entrance exam you need to write is EAMCET. The students who have intermediate qualification and good grade points in their tenth and plus two standards are eligible to get admission in the Raghu engineering institute. There are no interviews for the admission process.
